title: Woohoo! Champion update is listening!
body:
Thanks, people! My only complaint with Fiora now is with her face on her model, but I play Lunar Goddess Diana and her face is even worse so meh. My preferred skin (Nightraven) is good, her splash art is good, and now I just have to hope the kit isn't as bad as I feared.

Thanks for listening! Glad you learned from your previous failures.
